alert.note: Alert for Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...HEAVY RAIN WILL AFFECT EAST CENTRAL WARREN AND WEST CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 838 PM EDT, an area of heavy rain was located over Lake George Village. The heavy rain is nearly stationary. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Lake George Village, Comstock, Lake Luzerne Campground, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Mount Hope, Lake George, Fort Ann, Thurman Station, Cleverdale, Big Hollow, French Mountain, Smiths Basin, Oneida Corners, Tripoli, Athol, Brayton, Lake Sunnyside and Rockhurst. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 20 and 23. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington
